title: Reunion
description: Your favourite families from the Men in Love series are back.For over ten years, Gabe Whitlock's ex-SEAL buddies have searched for the woman who abandoned him as a small child. When Jake Sommers receives a phone call from a woman claiming to be Gabe's long-lost sister, he calls the team together once more. As the past unfolds, and mysteries are uncovered, the gang converges on the Triple Spur to rally around their friend.Reader Advisory: This book is part of a series released with another publisher.
author: Carol Lynne
